name: ajoberstar.org
body:
You can see all of my repositories on the standard [Github](http://github.com/ajoberstar) user page, but below are some of the more active ones.

## Gradle Plugins

I've made a few plugins for the [Gradle](http://gradle.org) build tool. My active ones are:

* [Gradle-Git](/gradle-git) - collection of plugins and tasks to interact with Git
* [Gradle-Imports](/gradle-imports) - organizes Java/Groovy import statements (for those who don't like IDEs)

The following ones are deprecated, as they are now in Gradle core.

* [Gradle-Jacoco](/gradle-jacoco) - plugin to enable Jacoco coverage analysis
* [Gradle-Plugins](/gradle-plugins) - Findbugs, JDepend, and PMD plugins

## Libraries

* [Grgit](/grgit) - general purpose Git library implemented in Groovy (wrapped around JGit)

## Applications

Here's a couple apps I created mainly for my own "productivity". Not that spending weeks or months writing an app necessarily makes you more productive...

* [Todo.txt-HTML5](/todo.txt-html5) - todo list web app that uses the [todo.txt](http://todotxt.com) format
* [Mulima](/mulima) - a music library manager for people who want to control their metadata
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
